ens.description: Ethereum Name Service (ENS) domains are secure domains names for the decentralized world. ENS domains provide a way for user to map human readable names to blockchain and non-blockchain resources, like Ethereum addresses, IPFS hashes, or website URLs. ENS domains can be bought and sold on secondary markets.

onChainSecurity.appConnectCriticalWarning: We believe this app is malicious and connecting would be unsafe. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.appConnectMediumWarning: The app sending the request cannot be verified.
onChainSecurity.appSignMessageCriticalWarning: We believe this app is malicious and message unsafe to sign. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.appSignMessageMediumWarning: The app sending the request cannot be verified.
onChainSecurity.appSignTransactionCriticalWarning: We believe this app is malicious and transaction unsafe to sign. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.appSignTransactionMediumWarning: The app sending the request cannot be verified.
onChainSecurity.appWarning: We believe this app is malicious and connecting would be unsafe. Approving may lead to loss of funds
onChainSecurity.domainMatchInfo: The domain linked to this request has been verified as this application's domain.
onChainSecurity.domainMismatchInfo: This website has a domain that does not match the sender of this request. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.domainMismatchMessage: The application's domain doesn't match the sender of this request. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.knownSecurityRiskInfo: This website is flagged as unsafe by multiple security providers. To protect your assets, do NOT connect to it.
onChainSecurity.knownSecurityRiskMessage: This website is flagged as unsafe by multiple security providers. Leave immediately to protect your assets from being drained
onChainSecurity.signTransactionCriticalWarning: We believe this transaction is malicious and unsafe to sign. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.transactionWarning: We believe this transaction is malicious and unsafe to sign. Approving may lead to loss of funds
onChainSecurity.unverifiedApp: The app sending the request cannot be verified.

passwordProtection.authFailedDescription: You can try again, or you may completely wipe and reset the app
passwordProtection.biometricDescriptionAndroid: even if you‚Äôve setup Biometrics via App Lock
passwordProtection.biometricDescriptionIOS: even if you‚Äôve setup FaceID, or TouchID via App Lock
passwordProtection.dataLoss1: I understand that reseting the app will completely restore it to a fresh install state.
passwordProtection.dataLoss2: I understand that after the app is restored, I will need my secret recovery phrase(s) to access my wallet(s).
passwordProtection.dataLoss3: I understand that if I reset the app and don‚Äôt have my wallet secret recovery phrase(s), it will be impossible to restore my wallet(s).
passwordProtection.dataLoss4: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase(s), I‚Äôm solely responsible for any loss of assets.
passwordProtection.disablePasswordDescription: Enter password to turn-off password protection
passwordProtection.lockout: Too many failed attempts, try again later
passwordProtection.passwordHintLetters: Try using upper and lowercase letters
passwordProtection.passwordSupersedesAppLockDescription: If you create a password, it will be required to make transactions, {biometricDescription}. For security both will be required.
passwordProtection.protectYourData: Protect your data with extra encryption
passwordProtection.rationaleCreateWallet: Your password is required to create a new wallet
passwordProtection.rationaleGetXPub: Your password is required to see your extended public key
passwordProtection.rationaleSeeRecoveryPhrase: to view your Secrete Recovery Phrase
passwordProtection.rationaleSignTransaction: Your password is required to sign transactions
passwordProtection.requireOnOpen: Require each time you open app?
passwordProtection.requireOnOpenDesc: Adds security by double-encrypting your app data, but you‚Äôll need to enter the password each app open
passwordProtection.resetHintModalDesc: To adjust password options, you‚Äôll need to disable password protection, and re-enable it again with the added change.
passwordProtection.title: Password protection
passwordProtection.walletLockedDescription: Enter your password to unlock it
passwordProtection.warningDescription: Store your password in a secure place. It is encrypted locally on your device, so it cannot be retrieved by Kraken if lost or forgotten.
passwordProtection.whatIsDescription: It adds extra security by requiring a password to allow the following actions:
passwordProtection.wrongPasswordDescription: Check your password and try again
